```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggplot2)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(cowplot)
```


```{r}
sup <- function(x){
  return(x)
}

dem_us <- function(x){
  return(75-x)
}

price_world <- function(x){
  return(25)
}

```


```{r}
ggplot() +
  stat_function(fun = sup, color = "green") +
  stat_function(fun = dem_us, color = "blue") +
  stat_function(fun = price_world, color = "red")  +
  xlim(0, 100) + ylim(0, 100) +
  theme_minimal()
```
